questions.question_text: What process allows an administrator to prepare 500 newly purchased Windows 10 devices for Workspace ONE enrollment without joining the devices to the organization's Active Directory (AD) domain or using Azure AD?

discussion.content: Hi All, this question will be changed from "50 newly purchased Windows 10" to "Small newly purchased Windows 10", so this answer is "A"?

comments.content:
Sorry, this questionï¼š
Hi All, this question will be changed from "500 newly purchased Windows 10 device for Workspace ONE enrollment" to "Large newly purchased Windows 10 device for Workspace ONE enrollment", so this answer is "B"?

discussion.content:
Confirm Correct Answer B, D, F:

https://www.vmware.com/products/workspace-one/intelligence.html

questions.question_text: Which are the key functionalities of Workspace ONE Intelligence? (Choose three.)

An administrator wants external end users to enroll new Windows 10 devices in Workspace ONE without the administrator needing to register the device prior to enrollment. The organization requires all devices meet the organization security requirements before the device joins the organization internal Active Directory domain.
Which Workspace ONE process accomplishes this task?

discussion.content:
Cannot be B because it must be enrolled to a Domain to Manual Staging.

https://docs.vmware.com/en/VMware-Workspace-ONE-UEM/2001/Windows_Desktop_Device_Management/GUID-AWT-ENROLL-STAGECONFIGWD.html

Correct Answer is C:

https://docs.vmware.com/en/VMware-Workspace-ONE-UEM/2001/Windows_Desktop_Device_Management/GUID-AWT-ENROLL-BULK.html

questions.question_text: What two steps would an administrator take to troubleshoot iOS devices that are not communicating with the console? (Choose two.)

choices.E: Confirm that the APNs certificate is still valid
choices.D: Confirm that the VPP token is valid
choices.B: Confirm that the iOS devices have network connection
